description: Two randy ranch hands - Falcon Exclusive Roman Heart and long-dicked newcomer Carter Longway - are killing time in a barn when their boss Scott Swann asks them to keep an eye on Fancy, his gal who's outside tending to a horse. As soon as he's out the door, the two studs start going at it. They're joined mid-fuck by Ken Browning, and the three take turns fucking and sucking all around. When they're passed out from their marathon fuck session, sneaky Ken kidnaps the woman and the horse!
title: Riding Hard, Scene #01
